title: Technique: Along for the Ride - AOPA
body: Flying the Navion on the VOR approach into Tullahoma Regional Airport (THA) that day in 2004 took all the concentration I could muster. Despite constant pitch corrections, I just couldn't seem to get it right. I felt as though I were more along for the ride than in control of the airplane. After witnessing several minutes of my struggle, Rich Ranaudo, my colleague and mentor in flight ...
